title: Digital Marketing Manager

title: Accountant & Operations Executive
job_description:
The position

The Holistics HR team is seeking a new member to support Vietnam's internal accounting process and operations tasks.
This is a full-time position based in Ho Chi Minh City.‍

About Holistics‍

Holistics is a cloud business intelligence SaaS with over 350 customers across 40 countries. Founded in 2015, Holistics has since grown to a profitable and fully self-funded company with over 50 employees spread across 8 cities globally.

Our core business intelligence product allows analytics practitioners to setup a self-service platform that enables their business users to perform self-service analytics and data exploration independently.

What you’ll work on here

Operations Admin:
 + Handle logistics, purchasing of various items: office furniture, medicine, company happy hours, etc.
 + Oversee office resources, maintaining and monitoring the status of employee’s workstations.

Finance Admin: After completing all purchases, continue to record the expenses. You'll be responsible for managing the book-keeping process in Vietnam and involved in preparing the monthly Vietnam Operations Reports for the headquarters.

Vietnam Accountant Executive: Coordinate with the Operations Manager to manage Vietnam's accounting process and legal reporting.

HR Administrator: The company utilizes outsourced services for handling Social Insurance, Personal Income Tax, and related HR tasks per Vietnamese law. This position is responsible for directly overseeing and confirming their efficiency.
- Event manager: Currently, the Bonding Event poses a significant challenge in Holistics. We lack the resources to effectively brainstorm ideas and track members for event organization. It would be wonderful if you could take the lead in this area and contribute your creative ideas, especially if you have experience organizing events at university and enjoy such tasks.

Furthermore, if you're interested in handling the compensation and benefits task, you're welcome to take it on.
Perform other tasks as assigned by the Operations Manager from time to time.

You should join us if you

- This position is advantageous for individuals who aspire to launch their own business one day.
- For future startup success, beyond having a compelling product and external revenue, it's crucial to efficiently oversee in-house procedures, costs, staff aspirations and perks, and keep track of intra-organizational activities from start to finish.
- Prior to embarking on a journey as a founder, it is crucial to gain foundational experience. This involves comprehending the hierarchy within a company, addressing high-level to low-level difficulties, dealing with unforeseen issues, and consistently enhancing your abilities and expertise.
- It would be advantageous if you could secure a role that involves participation in all internal operational procedures, despite not being a founder. Such fundamental experiences will serve you well going forward.
- In this role, you will be able to acquaint yourself with the inner workings of HR, Finance, and Operations, thereby gaining a comprehensive insight into these processes.
- In terms of your professional journey, you could aspire to become an Operations Manager. This role could equip you with the requisite skills to establish your own project or business.
requirements:
What we look for in you

Here’s our idea of a good team member fit:

People skills & Mindset
- Strong problem-solving, critical thinking, adaptability, and sensitivity to situations
- Ability to handle multitasking and collaborate with numerous individuals within tight deadlines.
- Effective expectation management abilities and sophistication in resolving human issues
- Continuous learning & growth mindset: You find yourself excited to learn something new as part of the work every week. Eager to acquire new knowledge as part of the job every week. Pursue weekly performance enhancement and tackle repetitive tasks using creative strategies.
- Be prepared to work outside of your designated scope, as you will need to follow the tasks assigned by the Operations Manager.

Professional Expertise
- Deep Understanding of Core Accounting Principles, such as expense tracking, asset accounting, and cost analysis.
- Vietnam HR and Corporate Law: Have a strong foundation in Social Insurance, Personal Income Tax, and Corporate Law.
- Must Have: Strong Excel skills, ability to use Excel for setting up internal operations processes, calculations, and ad-hoc analytics.
- Great English writing and communication skills. (IELTs 5.0 ++)
‍

Compensation and Benefits
Compensation
- 13-month salary; annual compensation reviews
Benefits:
- 24/7 healthcare insurance; periodic medical checkup.
- Annual budget for personal and professional growth, well-beings and interest cultivations.
- 14 annual leaves, 14 sick leaves, child-care leave policy.
- Weekly happy hours. Annual company trip and company-organized events

title: [Hà Nội] Account Executive – Field Sales with 2-Year Working Experiences.
job_description:
The purpose of this job is to identify and develop customer relationships and perform an accomplished level of sales responsibilities with the objective to build the customer base, achieve revenue targets and ensure customer satisfaction.

In the position of an Account Executive, your key role is to:

• Obtain leads for new business.
• Gather information about customers' business products and process, and their transportation challenges through face-to-face contact.
• Seek and identify opportunities to grow the business with existing customers.
• Identify customer’s needs and develop value propositions to meet those needs.
• Create a market-based pricing structure.
• Prepare a sales proposal to target the needs of customers.
• Deliver sales presentation to persuade potential customers to use FedEx products and/or services.
• Coordinate with internal resources to teach customers how to use FedEx tools and services.
• Answer customer questions about FedEx products or services during sales call
• Create and execute implementation plans with the customers.
• Monitor implementation progress to ensure timelines are met.
• Identify barriers to successful implementation and recommend ways to remove or minimize them.
• Troubleshoot and resolve customer’s problems.
• Contact customers to find out how well the solutions are meeting their business needs.
• Present review findings to customers using the available system reporting tool.
requirements:
To do the job well, you will need the following qualifications but not limited to: 

• A bachelor’s degree or any equivalent training. 
• Two (2) years professional experience in commercial or industrial sales.
• Knowledge of sales process and activities.
• Clear communication skills, both orally and in writing and in English, and Vietnamese.
• Strong presentation skills.
• Able to influence and negotiate with others using active listening and persuasion skills. 

The working location of this position is in Hanoi, Vietnam and you will need to work at least 40 hours per week.

• Tiến hành nghiên cứu, định hướng và xác định phương án cung cấp các loại hình dịch vụ mới như: giải pháp TRỌN GÓI cho Chuyên gia nước ngoài đang làm việc và sinh sống tại Việt Nam hoặc các dịch vụ xin thị thực VISA IN/OUTBOUND.
• Tối ưu hoá các mối quan hệ, tiềm lực SẴN CÓ nhằm cải thiện dịch vụ cũ và phát triển dịch vụ mới

• Phát triển khách hàng: trực tiếp tiếp cận, gặp gỡ, trao đổi, đàm phán với các đối tác/doanh nghiệp có lao động người nước ngoài.
• Đào tạo đội ngũ kế thừa và phát triển nguồn lực của phòng nhằm đảm bảo sự phát triển/mở rộng hệ sinh thái doanh nghiệp.

● Tính, theo dõi, thu học phí và giải quyết vấn đề liên quan đến học phí cho sinh viên
● Phiếu thu tiền và các hóa đơn tương ứng với phương thức thanh toán của các phụ huynh (tiền mặt, POS và chuyển khoản ngân hàng);
● Xuất hóa đơn, ghi nhận doanh thu và kiểm soát công nợ
● Lưu trữ, đối chiếu giao dịch trên sổ sách kế toán và cập nhật các báo cáo theo dõi tương ứng

3. Phần hành chi phí – phải trả nhà cung cấp:
● Kiểm tra các hợp đồng dịch vụ, hóa đơn và lập yêu cầu thanh toán phù hợp với luật ban hành
● Đối chiếu kiểm soát công nợ hàng tháng với các nhà cung cấp (nếu có)

4. Lương:
● Thuế thu nhập cá nhân
● Lập lệnh thanh toán lương, bảo hiểm, thuế và các tờ khai tương ứng;
● Ghi nhận hoạch toán lương, bảo hiểm, thuế TNCN dựa trên bảng tính lương có sẵn

5. Thuế giá trị gia tăng:
● Kiểm tra toàn bộ các hóa đơn đầu vào, đầu ra, cập nhật bảng kê hóa đơn phù hợp, lên tờ khai
VAT theo đúng luật thuế hiện hành;

6. Thuế nhà thầu nước ngoài:
● Đăng ký mã số thuế cho nhà thầu nước ngoài, chuẩn bị bảng tính thuế nhà thầu và lập tờ khai
chính xác và đúng hạn;

7. Thuế thu nhập doanh nghiệp:
● Kiểm tra toàn bộ doanh thu, chi phí hợp lý hợp lệ theo quy định của pháp luật và cập nhật tờ khai quyết toán thuế TNDN vào cuối năm tài chính;
● Các báo cáo thuế khác: Chuẩn bị và nộp tờ khai thuế chính xác và đúng hạn;

8. Các nhiệm vụ khác:
● Thực hiện hạch toán các bút toán tổng hợp cuối tháng.
● Thực hiện tính toán và ghi nhận các khoản chi phí trả trước, chi phí khấu hao.

title: Principal, Scotch AGS
job_description:
Position Overview
The primary area of responsibility for the Principal is oversight of the day to day operations of Scotch AGS, with a specific focus on child protection, pastoral care of students and the ethos and wellbeing of staff. We currently have 2 operational campuses which are growing, with a third campus planned. The leadership model at this school is highly collaborative with the Heads of Campus, the Principal, the CEO and the Deputy Principal – Academic working together to make decisions. 

Key Responsibilities

Academic Leadership
• Promote and implement practices and initiatives that support and encourage the achievement of academic excellence and the all-round development of students. 
• Promote a culture of academic rigour amongst the teaching staff of Scotch AGS.
• Lead and coordinate the performance management process for academic staff, including conducting performance reviews for direct reports and assisting Academic Managers, Heads of Campus and Subject Coordinators to manage underperformance.
• Participate in recruitment and selection processes for all teachers involved in the delivery of Australian Curriculum and SACE programs, ensuring recruitment considers not only academic matters but the attitudes of teachers to ensure ‘cultural fit’ at Scotch AGS
• Lead induction programs for new staff, with a specific focus on Safeguarding (Child Protection) for all staff, and matters related to the academic program for teaching staff.
• Oversee the distribution of student reports by the reporting deadline, for all campuses, each semester.

Building Culture
• Foster and grow a positive staff culture at Scotch AGS, including establishing common standards of practice, supporting events to develop collegiality, and undertaking mediation or disciplinary processes where required.
• Implement and lead processes that support an effective pastoral care program, with our unique RADI-RAHI Character Education framework at its core.
• Foster and grow a positive student culture at Scotch AGS, including establishing common standards of practice, supporting events to develop school pride. The Principal must have a strong presence within the school.
• Foster and grow a sense of community within Scotch AGS that includes parent engagement, in collaboration with the DP – Stakeholder engagement. 
• Oversee student, staff and community feedback processes.
• Lead important whole school celebrations and events, for example, graduation ceremonies or inauguration events. 
• Participate in promotional or community building events and activities, such as hosting visitors to the site, attending important functions and supporting marketing efforts where requested. 
• Oversee student recognition processes (e.g., awards) 
• Oversee whole school calendar of events and attend a cross section of events across all campus (e.g., Mid Autumn Festival, Tet, Sport and Musical events).

Policies, Processes and Reporting
• Develop, implement, and lead the policies and processes that ensure a culture of Child Protection and student safety is developed at Scotch AGS, including taking responsibility for ensuring that all staff are trained in child protection practices, and training is kept up to date.
• Ensure policies and procedures are in place to support the work, health and safety of staff, students and visitors to Scotch College AGS and coordinate the annual review and update of policies related to the day to day operations of Scotch AGS and the academic program, in consultation with the DP – Academic and the Heads of Campus and Academic Managers.
• Fulfil reporting requirements as required by the Academic Committee.

Student Management 
• Undertake mediation or disciplinary processes where required. Be the ultimate point of escalation in student disciplinary processes and, if required, provide a case to retain or terminate a student’s enrolment.
• In conjunction with the Heads of Campus, meet with new students and families as required by the admissions team and oversee the process of class placement which will be conducted by the Head of Campus.
• Respond immediately to any reported incidents related to the protection and safety of students and ensure a register is maintained of incidents and action taken, which is reported to the Academic Committee. 

Daily Operations – CBD Campus specific

• Working closely with the CEO and the CBD Office Manager, ensure that the campus offers a high level of safety for children, including implementing and monitoring policies and procedures to protect children.
• Coordinate weekly operations meetings with direct reports and key stakeholders to ensure services and facilities at the CBD Campus (e.g., nurse, library, security, cleaning etc) are available and functional, and that any issues are addressed in a timely manner.
• Oversee the events and activities that take place at the CBD Campus, ensuring activities are scheduled in advance communicated to stakeholders and carried out safely. 
• Ensure that customer service and reception staff welcome students and their families into the school and respond to enquiries or concerns efficiently and courteously.
requirements:
Essential Experience
• Qualified Secondary Teacher, with current registration to teach in Vietnam (or the ability to obtain registration prior to the start date) is essential.
• Preferred DOET and MOET requirement for the Certificate of Secondary Educational Leadership Management (Chung Chi Boi Duong Can Bo Giao Duc).
• A record of success in a leadership, management or senior position within a secondary environment. 
• At least 5 years’ experience in a school management position – preference will be given to candidates who have had experience as an international school Principal.
• Ability to translate strategic planning and thinking into operational plans and priorities.
• Previous success in people management and supervision.
• Experience in school financial management including overseeing school budgets.
• Experience in developing and implementing a school improvement plan.

Essential skills, qualifications and knowledge
• Evidence of post graduate study in leadership or management is essential – study in this area in the field of education would be highly advantageous. 
• Master’s degree in Education or Bachelor of Education with Master’s degree in a related field.
• Recent national police check – in Vietnam for current residents and/or home country for expat.

Highly desirable skills knowledge
• Knowledge of the South Australian Certificate of Education and/or the Australian Curriculum, and associated teaching, assessment and moderation practices.
• Previous experience working in a transnational education context.
• Ability to support the local contextualisation of provided curriculum.
• Experience in supporting professional development of teaching staff – preference will be given to applicants who have experience in supporting teacher development in English medium schools.

Key Selection Criteria: Personal Attributes

• A strong understanding of academic leadership and monitoring and management of an academic program
• A high degree of professional judgement and confidentiality.
• Superior organisational ability with demonstrated self-motivation and initiative in goal setting, prioritising work and managing multiple tasks.
• Excellent interpersonal skills, including the ability to listen and communicate effectively across all areas of the school community.
• Ability to work in a transnational education context. 
• Experience in responding to quality improvement feedback
• High level problem solving ability, with the skills to respond to the challenges that occur in a new school environment, and the desire to grow the school into a site of excellence.

Conditions of Employment
• You must be eligible to work in Vietnam.
• You must meet all relevant pre-employment screening and adhere to the Scotch College AGS Child Protection policy.
• You must be willing to work flexible hours to service Scotch College AGS’ various activities, which will include occasional evening and weekend work.

Finally
No job description for a school leader can fully describe the complexities of the role. Equally, Scotch College AGS recognises that every potential leader brings their own unique skills and abilities to the job and welcomes that. Scotch College AGS also understands that a leader must be fully supported by the board to fulfill the constantly changing tasks that will ensure the long term success of the school.

job_description:

To teach English lessons with regard to the Australian Curriculum English framework.
To teach SACE English subjects as the Year 10 cohort progresses to Year 11 (2023) and Year 12 (2024).

To communicate teaching, learning and assessment activities and feedback to students using the school’s *Learning Management System.

To provide parents/ caregivers with meaningful reports on student achievement.
To participate in internal and external moderation processes.

To model exemplary teaching practice.
To use a range of teaching and learning strategies, including but not limited to, direct instruction – whole class and small group, class discussions, group work, independent learning, practical activities.
To conduct formal parent - teacher meetings in accordance with the school parent - teacher meeting arrangements and schedule.
To actively seek and be involved in opportunities for your own professional learning.
To participate in an annual appraisal process, which includes feedback from students.
*General
To contribute broadly to the activities offered by the School, including supporting and attending School community events and participating in promotional activities at the request of the site Principal.
To attend all staff meetings.
To undertake other duties as required.
To demonstrate a commitment to professional learning in relation to the requirements of this role.

We care significantly for your safety. You must: 
take reasonable care of, and cooperate with actions taken to protect, the health and safety of both yourself and others,
report all accidents, incidents and hazards as soon as is practicable and
adhere to School policies.

Well-developed verbal and written communication skills when communicating in English.

Private health insurance.

title: Primary Homeroom Teacher
job_description:
Key Responsibility Areas
Curriculum
- To teach primary subjects with regard to the Australian Curriculum Primary education framework.
- To prepare and submit programs each semester in line with school requirements.
- To communicate teaching, learning and assessment activities and feedback to pupils using the school’s Learning Management System.
- To develop programs which cater inclusively to all pupils, supporting those in need as well as those requiring extension.
- To work with other primary teachers to ensure consistency of program and assessment across year levels.

Assessment and Reporting
- To assess and report on student achievement in line with the Australian Curriculum - - Achievement Standard for Primary Education.
- To maintain accurate and comprehensive records of student performance and achievement.
- To use a variety of formative and summative assessment methods.
- To provide relevant and meaningful feedback, regularly and promptly, to promote student learning.
- To provide parents/ caregivers with meaningful reports on student achievement.
- To participate in internal and external moderation processes.

Teaching and Learning
- To model exemplary teaching practice.
- To use a range of teaching and learning strategies, including but not limited to, direct instruction – whole class and small group, class discussions, group work, independent learning, practical activities.
- To conduct formal parent - teacher meetings in accordance with the school parent - teacher meeting arrangements and schedule.
- To actively seek and be involved in opportunities for your own professional learning.
- To participate in an annual appraisal process, which includes feedback from pupils.

General
- To contribute broadly to the activities offered by the School, including supporting and attending School community events and participating in promotional activities at the request of the site Principal.
- To attend all staff meetings.
- To undertake other duties as required.
- To demonstrate a commitment to professional learning in relation to the requirements of this role.

Safety and wellbeing
We care significantly for your safety. You must: 
- take reasonable care of, and cooperate with actions taken to protect, the health and safety of both yourself and others,
- report all accidents, incidents and hazards as soon as is practicable and
- adhere to School policies.
requirements:
Key selection criteria: Qualifications, Skills and Experience 
- Bachelor of Education degree (or equivalent).

title: Maintenance Engineer Executive
job_description:

• Develop and maintain effective preventative maintenance programs to ensure equipment reliability and comprehensive documentation.
• Utilize practical experience in working with production line equipment, emphasizing module preventive and predictive maintenance systems.

• Cultivate a Safety First culture, enforcing safe work practices and compliance with local regulatory guidelines.
• Analyze equipment status, formulate swift solutions, and ensure the cost-effective repair of control equipment.
• Collaborate with Engineering and Production to enhance safety, productivity, quality, and cost efficiency.
• Document crucial maintenance records based on project orders.
• Supervise contractors, ensuring strict adherence to company standards.
• Demonstrate expertise in automatic and industrial electricity, as well as the functions of industrial equipment on the production line.
• Support cost reduction, productivity, and quality improvement initiatives.
• Ensure appropriate selection and inventory of spare parts in safety stock.
• Design, layout, construct, and/or install new equipment.

• Implement Lockout-Tagout (LOTO) procedures in equipment management.
• Perform other duties as assigned to meet business conditions or changes.
• Adhere to quality and safety standards in all maintenance activities.
• Support and propose application design to customers on-site
• Support to handle customer’s technical queries or requirement
• Plan and conduct technical seminar/roadshow to reach out to more potential customers
• Handle customer's product claim

job_description:

CÔNG VIỆC CẦN THỰC HIỆN
• Làm việc từ bản thiết kế, bản phác thảo, khái niệm và hướng dẫn bằng lời nói để nghĩ ra và chế tạo khuôn dập, đồ gá, đồ gá và dụng cụ để đáp ứng các yêu cầu của khách hàng.

• Thực hiện đánh giá và điều chỉnh khuôn trong quá trình thử khuôn mới và quá trình sản xuất để đánh giá hiệu suất của khuôn đối với các thông số kỹ thuật được yêu cầu và đưa ra các đề xuất thay đổi hoặc sửa chữa.
• Thử khuôn mới hoặc khuôn hiện có trong bộ phận khuôn và sản xuất bằng máy dập tự động.
• Chẩn đoán và khắc phục những khó khăn về khuôn và dụng cụ.
• Hỗ trợ, tư vấn và hướng dẫn nhân viên và người học việc ít kinh nghiệm hơn để đáp ứng các mức hiệu suất cần thiết trong các khía cạnh kỹ thuật và an toàn của tất cả các quy trình và hoạt động sử dụng khuôn.
• Đề xuất các ý tưởng để cải thiện các khái niệm về khuôn nhằm tác động tích cực đến quy trình sản xuất và bảo trì dụng cụ.
• Sử dụng tất cả các thiết bị đo lường chính xác trong phòng khuôn
• Thường xuyên làm việc để đạt dung sai +/-.002 mm trong việc gia công các linh kiện khuôn.
• Kiểm tra, đo đạc, kiểm tra độ chính xác của các loại linh kiện khuôn, dụng cụ để thực hiện các hoạt động sản xuất dập, tạo hình theo ủy quyền
• Trao đổi với các bộ phận kỹ thuật và sản xuất phù hợp để giải quyết các vấn đề và trao đổi thông tin theo yêu cầu
• Đảm nhận vai trò tích cực trong việc cung cấp đầu vào mang tính xây dựng cho các cuộc họp về ý tưởng thiết kế và các cuộc họp đánh giá thiết kế.
• Tuân thủ tất cả các quy tắc và thủ tục của công ty bao gồm vệ sinh, chất lượng công việc và an toàn.
• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác khi được giao hoặc cần thiết để đáp ứng các điều kiện hoặc thay đổi kinh doanh.
• Tuân thủ các hệ thống chất lượng và an toàn hoặc duy trì các tiêu chuẩn chất lượng và an toàn.
requirements:
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
• Có kiến thức về thiết kế khuôn, chế tạo điện cực; máy khoan thủ công, máy phay thủ công, máy cưa vòng, máy tiện, máy mài bề mặt, máy đầm bán kính, thiết bị EDM thông thường, thiết bị xử lý nhiệt

- Xây dựng lộ trình, tài liệu đào tạo

- Triển khai đánh giá xét ký Hợp đồng lao động

- Hợp tác với các nhà cung cấp/giảng viên bên ngoài để lên kế hoạch triển khai các chương trình đào tạo

title: Portfolio Assistant Manager
job_description:
According to Decree No.13/2023/ND-CP on protecting personal data (“PDP”), Home Credit Vietnam would apply "Personal Data Processing Agreement" with all candidates to ensure compliance with the decree.

By submitting this application to Home Credit Vietnam Finance Company Limited through Vietnamworks, you agree to allow Home Credit to proceed your provided information in accordance with Personal Data Processing Agreement that you have read, fully understood and agreed to the entire content at link https://career.homecredit.vn/en/article/id/217

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Balance Build

- Design, execute and monitor end-to-end cards balance build strategy
- Continuous improvement of balance build program to maximise credit card balances and profitability for the business with regular benchmarking to market
- Develop and implement balance build initiatives to drive increased balances across key portfolio segments (incl. EPP, balance transfer etc)
- Leverage data and analytics to optimize pricing, targeting and take-up tailored to specific segments of the portfolio

2. Portfolio Segmentation

- Support Cards Portfolio Strategy manager on cards portfolio segmentation initiatives related to balance build

3. Credit Limit Management

- Co-ownership of credit limit management strategy with Underwriting department
- Including on-going strategy for BAU and seasonal portfolio limit increase and decreases
- Regular monitoring and enhancement of credit limit management strategy to enhance cards balances and profitability

4. Other responsibilities

- Responsible for implementing, managing, and enhancing Credit Card balance build activities to achieve the company’s overall strategic, business and financial goals.
- Devises, develops and regularly maintains Credit Card balance build strategy, short- and long-term goals, Volume plans, tactics and programs based on the business strategy, opportunities and plans, budget, potential of target customers, consumer needs, competitors, resources and abilities.
- Support Credit Card Portfolio volume plans, financial plans and budget and tracks their performance versus budget, ensuring achievement of plans despite variances/challenging operating environment.
- Initiation, Development and Implementation of marketing campaigns/promotions for better Credit Cards customers engagement
- Accountability for budgets allocated to Credit Card Balance Build activities and management of key metrics for Credit Card Balance build, against business goals and competitor benchmarking
- Initiate development of Reports, Dashboards and other analytics from Data analytics team with proper description of task and metrics for Credit Card Balance Build
- Use of data-driven approach for the development of new activities and management of Credit Card Balance build
- Support Credit Card Customer Lifecycle activities including all portfolio actions that drive activation, usage and retention
- Work with Lifecycle, Marketing and Digital teams to continuously engage with customers through digital media and improve user engagement
- Collaborate across various teams to support end-to-end Credit Card Portfolio customer engagement and balance build programs that aim to implement strategies to grow and improve overall segment profitability
- Monitors and evaluates results and effectiveness metrics of the implemented actions (CBA, SWOT analysis), proposes changes to improve results and to achieve better CBA
- Initiates and cooperates with Marketing team and CRM team on preparation of marketing and CRM campaigns for Credit Card Portfolio, incl. internal and external communication (preparation of campaign briefs – target customers’ definition, main benefits, differentiators from competitors, etc.) and marketing materials (like leaflets, posters, direct mails, etc.), on update of promo/marketing or other campaign information on company, partners and public websites, social networks, etc.
requirements:
- Experience of driving customer engagement & growth initiatives for Credit Card portfolio especially focused on Credit Card Balance build or Usage Activities
- At least 3 years experience in Cards areas, preferred hand-on experience in Cards Portfolio or at least 3 years experience in consumer finance or Banking experience with a good perspective of the consumer and Revolving products, processes, pricing, technologies, etc.
- Experience working with credit card portfolio and balance build/spend initiatives
- Consumer finance or Banking experience with a good perspective of the consumer and Revolving products, processes, pricing, technologies, etc.
- Understands the business and industry dynamics of credit cards and is passionate to deliver new and winning solutions
- Understanding of the Credit Card Business & Vietnam Market
- Experienced in customer lifecycle management and utilizing consumers insights to drive engagement
- Proven Project Management delivery
- Ability to use and simplify complex information/data and various metrics to set-up and develop products with an informed and factual business case
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to efficiently collect, organize, analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
- Excellent cooperation, negotiation, presentation and decision-making skills to implement initiatives and deliver results
- Learning/ experiences related to DA/ BI/ ML tools (like SQL, Oracle, Python, R, Power BI, Tableau) is a strong advantage
- Proficient with MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint,...)
- Fluent in English
- Bachelor or Master Degree (Marketing, Economics & Finance or Banking, Data/Business Analytics)

title: Senior Credit Analysis Manager
job_description:
1. Credit appraisal process:
• Ensure the underwriting /loan process is operated smoothly and professionally in compliance with Credit policy, Business code and Company’s guidelines.
• Manage customer’s Credit Line facilities through regular monitoring, analysis and reporting on customer performance and needs.
• Oversee studying and analysing relating reports to track team performance (i.e. loan application approval, call-back time) as well as improving team performance to attain the KPI target.
• Ensure all internal & external compliance requirements are documented, procedures written, requirements implemented into business processes and reporting undertaken within prescribed timelines.
• Ensure related KYC ("Know Your Customer”) and required documents submitted from Business Development Team are verified and crosschecked properly by Credit Analyst on timely basis
• Ensure internal Credit Appraisal and Decision policy, procedure, rules, guidelines at Department are well maintained and updated in accordance with internal and external regulatory changes when required.

2. Loan approval:
• Take full responsibility of operation of Credit Analysis Team with the regards to direct review and approval or recommendation upon all transactions as allowed for in the Delegated Lending Authority.

3. Customer service quality:
• Give recommendation on loan terms and conditions to Sales Consultant to convert risky customers to potential ones.
• Provide an assistance in developing/customizing training materials in fields of credit and financial products and delivering those materials to Sales and relevant staffs.
• Support Risk Management Team to establish and maintain a Credit Risk grading system backed with statistically tested and validated attributes for loan grading and risk provisioning.
• Attract, develop, and retain people with the skills and motivation to continuously provide the best in class of service to distributors’ dealers and customers.
• Ensure rotation in subordinate positions, including having a back-up for all key tasks so that there are no business interruptions while maintaining headcount limits.

4. Portfolio management:
• Provide transparent and regular analysis reporting on status, timelines, success, and failures on all credit risk management activities, both at portfolio, segmented and individual/corporate application levels.
• Provide proper monitor and control mechanism to ensure optimal level of credit risk and operational risk for portfolio under management.
• Ensure a proper operation of Early-Warning-Signals system, which help deter and detect potential credit risk and fraud risk at early stage.

5. People Development
• Ensure staff under management are well-equipped with necessary technical knowledge and skills to well accomplished all assigned tasks and duties.

6. Other assignments:
• Use expertise to answer questions, resolve or escalate issues from junior team members to MB member in-charge with suggested solutions.
• Ad-hoc tasks assigned by Company’s Management.
requirements:
• Degree qualified in a quantitative discipline.
• Preferred 5-year experience gained in managing retail and/or wholesale products in either the banking or finance industries.
• Preferred 3-year experience in the position of Credit Analysis Head.
• Demonstrated history of credit risk management through both consumer and commercial lending management
• Fluency in English. Effective written and oral communicator.

title: Production Manager
job_description:
Summary:

We are seeking a driven and results-oriented Production Manager to lead our production team and ensure the successful execution of our production plan. You will be responsible for developing strategies, setting objectives, and overseeing all aspects of production to achieve on-time delivery, safety compliance, quality standards, cost efficiency, and environmental sustainability. Additionally, you will play a key role in continuously improving processes, empowering your team, and fostering their development.

Accountability & Output:

• Production Strategy and Planning:
. Develop comprehensive production strategies aligned with company goals.
. Set clear production objectives and establish detailed plans for achieving them.
. Organize and lead the production team to ensure efficient and timely execution of the plan.
. Allocate resources optimally to meet production targets.

• Communication and Collaboration:
. Effectively manage information flow within the team and across departments.
. Cascade production targets and escalate issues to ensure alignment with short- and long-term objectives.
. Coordinate with other functions (e.g., quality, safety, human resources) to address issues and find solutions.

• Team Management and Development:
. Build and execute workforce development programs to ensure skill development and flexibility within the team.
. Motivate, guide, and coach team members to achieve objectives in line with company values.
. Provide timely feedback and coaching to develop team potential and promote a positive culture.
. Ensure succession plans and development for direct reports (if applicable).

• Safety and Quality:
. Maintain a safe working environment by adhering to regulations and promoting safe work practices.
. Ensure adherence to quality standards and strive for continuous improvement.

• Performance and Reporting:
. Monitor production results and implement adjustments to achieve long-term goals.
. Report production results and suggest improvements to optimize performance.
. Advise the Board of Directors on production trends, market developments, and resource utilization within the plant.
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., engineering, manufacturing) and experience in similar management roles.
• Proven ability to set objectives, deploy production plans, and drive results.
• Strong leadership skills with a demonstrated ability to motivate and develop a team.
• Experience leading cross-functional projects.
• In-depth knowledge of manufacturing processes and quality standards.
• Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
• Business acumen and a strategic vision.
• Change management competency
• Strong analytical and critical thinking abilities

title: Cards Engagement Assistant Manager
job_description:
According to Decree No.13/2023/ND-CP on protecting personal data (“PDP”), Home Credit Vietnam would apply "Personal Data Processing Agreement" with all candidates to ensure compliance with the decree.

By submitting this application to Home Credit Vietnam Finance Company Limited through Vietnamworks, you agree to allow Home Credit to proceed your provided information in accordance with Personal Data Processing Agreement that you have read, fully understood and agreed to the entire content at link https://career.homecredit.vn/en/article/id/217

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Spend Engagement
- Design, execute and monitor end-to-end cards spend engagement strategy
- Continuous improvement of spend engagement program to maximize credit card spend and profitability for the business with regular benchmarking to market
- Develop and implement spend engagement initiatives to drive increased spend across key portfolio segments (e.g. cash back promotions, VAS related etc)
- Leverage data and analytics to optimize pricing/promotions, targeting and take-up tailored to specific segments of the portfolio
- Develop effective & attractive communication / marketing collaterals in collaboration with LC and Marketing to support the overall cards spend engagement strategy
- Develop portfolio engagement strategy and support execution of campaigns for VAS related products that meet the needs of credit card customers

2. Cards Retention
- Develop and implement end-to-end customer retention strategy to minimize customer voluntary closures, including: reactive retention, proactive retention and win-back strategies

3. Loyalty Management
- Support Cards Loyalty Manager in the management of end-to-end credit cards loyalty strategy
Including: Monitoring performance of loyalty program, including points earn/burn trends, management of the cards loyalty system

4. Other responsibilities
- Responsible for implementing, managing, and enhancing Credit Card spend engagement & retention activities to achieve the company’s overall strategic, business and financial goals.
- Devises, develops and regularly maintains Credit Card spend engagement & retention strategy, short- and long-term goals, Volume plans, tactics and programs based on the business strategy, opportunities and plans, budget, potential of target customers, consumer needs, competitors, resources and abilities.
- Support Credit Card Portfolio volume plans, financial plans and budget and tracks their performance versus budget, ensuring achievement of plans despite variances/challenging operating environment.
- Accountability for budgets allocated to Credit Card spend engagement & retention activities
Initiate development of Reports, Dashboards and other analytics from Data analytics team with proper description of task and metrics for Credit Card spend engagement & retention
- Manage the performance management of key metrics for Credit Card spend engagement & retention, against business goals and competitor benchmarking
- Use of data-driven approach for the development of new activities and management of Credit Card spend engagement & retention
- Support Credit Card Customer Lifecycle activities including all portfolio actions that drive activation, usage and retention
- Work with Lifecycle, Marketing and Digital teams to continuously engage with customers through digital media and improve user engagement
- Collaborate across various teams to support end-to-end Credit Card Portfolio spend engagement & retention programs that aim to implement strategies to grow and improve overall segment profitability
- Monitors and evaluates results and effectiveness metrics of the implemented actions (CBA, SWOT analysis), proposes changes to improve results and to achieve better CBA
- Initiates customers, competitors and market research in cooperation with Marketing team to monitor and evaluate market and competitors’ development, voice of customer (VOC), voice of sales (VOS), etc. to adjust entrusted products (parameters, pricing, processes, systems, etc.) accordingly.
- Initiates and cooperates with Marketing team and CRM team on preparation of marketing and CRM campaigns for Credit Card Portfolio, incl. internal and external communication (preparation of campaign briefs – target customers’ definition, main benefits, differentiators from competitors, etc.) and marketing materials (like leaflets, posters, direct mails, etc.), on update of promo/marketing or other campaign information on company, partners and public websites, social networks, etc.
requirements:
- Experience of driving customer engagement & growth initiatives for Credit Card portfolio especially focused on Credit Card Usage or Retention Activities
- At least 5 years experience in Cards areas, preferred hand-on experience in Cards usage and retention
- At least 3 years experience in consumer finance or Banking experience with a good perspective of the consumer and Revolving products, processes, pricing, technologies, etc.
- Experience working with credit card portfolio and balance build/spend initiatives
- Consumer finance or Banking experience with a good perspective of the consumer and Revolving products, processes, pricing, technologies, etc.
- Understands the business and industry dynamics of credit cards and is passionate to deliver new and winning solutions
- Understanding of the Credit Card Business & Vietnam Market
- Experienced in customer lifecycle management and utilizing consumers insights to drive engagement
- Proven Project Management delivery
- Ability to use and simplify complex information/data and various metrics to set-up and develop products with an informed and factual business case
- Ability to interpret regulatory requirements and application to products and processes
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to efficiently collect, organize, analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
- Excellent cooperation, negotiation, presentation and decision-making skills to implement initiatives and deliver results
- Proficient with MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint,...)
- Fluent in English
- University Degree (Marketing, Economics & Finance or Banking)

- Báo cáo thuế hàng tháng, hàng quý, hàng năm theo VAS và nội bộ.

job_description:

• Đảm bảo máy móc thiết bị ổn định an toàn sản xuất

• Phối hợp với các bộ phận khác trong công ty để hoàn thành tốt công việc
• Tuân thủ theo hệ thống đảm bảo chất lượng của công ty
• Sửa chữa, bảo dưỡng vệ sinh điện máy móc, nhà xưởng khi có sự cố phát sinh
• Làm việc về các thiết bị điện, điện tử tự động hóa, PLC
• Hiểu biết, sửa chữa các lỗi về điện Fauc, Mitshubishi của máy phay tiện CNC
• Cải tiến máy móc thiết bị trong nhà xưởng để tăng tính an toàn, hoạt động hiệu quả hơn.
• Quản lý hệ thống Điện nhà máy- Điện Lạnh, PCCC, Máy nén khí, Máy sấy ...
• Trực tiếp hướng dẫn/tham gia/chỉ đạo lắp đặt tủ điện, cấp nguồn máy khi có máy mới lắp đặt
• Tiếp nhận bàn giao kỹ thuật các máy móc thiết bị nhập mới trong công ty
• Lên kế hoạch định kỳ cho việc bảo trì, bảo dưỡng điện từng loại máy móc, thiết bị.
• Lập báo cáo khi xảy ra sự cố, báo cáo công việc định kỳ cho quản lý và Giám đốc.
• Lập kế hoạch mua sắm các thiết bị, vật tư để sửa chữa thay thế nếu hư hỏng.
• Lập kế hoạch KPI cho công việc mình đảm trách
• Tiêu chuẩn hệ thống bản vẽ sơ đồ điện nhà máy
• Báo cáo công việc với quản lý bộ phận và Giám đốc
requirements:
• Giới Tính: Nam.
• Trung thực, tự lực, có chuyên môn, có kỹ năng lãnh đạo mạnh mẽ, cẩn thận
• Tốt nghiệp Đại Học chuyên ngành Điện Công Nghiệp, hoặc các ngành có liên quan.
• Có kinh nghiệm, kỹ năng lãnh đạo nhóm, phòng ít nhất trên 5 năm ở vị trí nhóm trưởng/tổ trưởng
• Sử dụng được các phần mềm Autocad/Acad/PLC của các hãng Mitsubishi, Keyence…
• Có kinh nghiệm thi công tủ điện, hệ thống điện công nghiệp, nhà xưởng
• Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm tại các Công ty Nhật có chứng chỉ ISO 9000, 14000

• Được đảm bảo các quyền lợi, chế độ theo quy định của pháp luật Lao động và các chính sách phúc lợi của Công ty.

• Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện, năng động, hòa đồng.
• Được trang bị phương tiện làm việc đầy đủ. Được đào tạo kiến thức, hướng dẫn công việc cụ thể nhằm nâng cao kinh nghiệm.

title: Trưởng Nhóm Thiết Kế
job_description:
Mục đích công việc
• Lập kế hoạch, báo cáo đảm bảo các chỉ thị của TP được thực hiện đúng chất lượng, đúng kì hạn.
• Phụ trách theo dõi, giám sát nhân viên thực hiện công việc, thực thi công việc theo chuyên môn.

1. Về kỹ thuật

- Đi khảo sát và lên bản vẽ giải pháp, ý tưởng cho các máy tự động theo yêu cầu của khách hàng
- Lập các yêu cầu thiết kế và thông số trước khi lên giải pháp
- Lên các phương án giải pháp , thiết kế 3D, tìm kiếm, lựa chọn các vật tư tiêu chuẩn phù hợp
- Xuất bản vẽ chế tạo (2D)
- Tính toán dự trù giá vốn (vật tư, nhân công) cho dự án
- Lắp ráp máy hoặc giám sát, hướng dẫn lắp ráp máy (nếu hợp tác với các đối tác làm máy)
- Vận hành, kiểm tra chất lượng, tính năng, cơ cấu máy đúng với yêu cầu thiết kế
- Lên phương án sửa chữa, cải tiến máy
- Theo dõi lắp đặt máy tại nhà máy khách hàng hoặc đối tác

2. Về quản lý

- Lập kế hoạch dự án, sắp xếp công việc cho các thành viên trong nhóm, quản lý chặt tiến độ dự án
- Đào tạo kỹ năng khảo sát, hướng dẫn thiết kế, lắp ráp chế tạo máy và xử lý sự cố cho các thành viên
- Giám sát, kiểm tra và chịu trách nhiệm chính về giải pháp 3D, bản vẽ 2D, gia công, báo cáo kế hoạch, các vấn đề kỹ thuật, các vấn đề phát sinh cho từng dự án
- Tính toán đánh giá rủi ro về thiết kế, chế tạo, triển khai cho từng dự án
- Trao đổi công việc với các bộ phận liên quan , đối tác, khách hàng trong quá trình triển khai.
requirements:
• Giới tính: Nam, tuổi 22~ 42
• Đam mê, tận tâm với công việc.
• Bằng tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng trở lên chuyên ngành cơ khí, cơ điện tử. hoặc liên quan chuyên ngành tự động hóa.
• Kinh nghiệm làm việc từ 3 năm trở lên trong lĩnh vực thiết kế máy, có kiến thức về các linh kiện thiết bị trong lĩnh vực tự động hóa: Servo, PLC, xilanh điện, khí nén...

Vietpom là sàn thương mại điện tử về y tế hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. We are looking for young professionals with high attention to detail and a passion for delivering high-quality accounting work. In return we offer excellent remuneration, a long term career opportunity, work-life balance and a happy working environment. 

English

• Excellent communication & writing skills, Good command of English (IELTS 6.5 equivalent).
• Excellent understanding of basic accounting principles.

• Experience with Xero/MYOB and the Microsoft Office suite is an advantage (not compulsory).
• Knowledge of Australian taxation legislation is an advantage (not compulsory).
• Completed or completing CA/ACCA/ICAEW/CPA equivalent is an advantage (not compulsory).

title: FP&A Director
job_description:
1) Key Responsibility:
The role is responsible in leading the overall financial planning process of the Company to 
ensure that the Company is able set its objectives and goals, as well as establish a glide-path for meeting those same objectives and goals. In addition, the role also leads the 
creation and establishment of aligned portfolio models and value chain analysis aimed at 
helping Management in their decision making

Prioritized Responsibilities
1. Financial Planning
• Yearly Business Planning - Leading the overall Yearly Business Plan Process of the Company by supervising, reviewing and pre-aligning with the finance leaders in the country the business plan process and eventually consolidated business plan for discussion and approval by the Country GM and CFO
• Quarterly Rolling Estimates - leading the overall Quarterly Rolling Estimates of the Company by supervising, reviewing and pre-aligning with business leaders
• Monthly BP / RE Review - actual results vs Business Plan/Rolling Estimates reconciliations 
are done, variances are understood and explained. Risks and opportunities to the full year 
budget are highlighted and properly communicated

2. Financial Analysis
• Decision support - responsible for ensuring that a robust analysis is done by the team for 
projects/initiatives that would have an impact on the Company’s P&L, both in the short-term and the long-term
• Sales & Operations Planning - responsible for reviewing, and ensuring that impact of 
updated S&OP forecasts are highlighted to the CFO and the rest of the Leadership team in 
order to ensure that plans are put in place to mitigate potential risks, and also understand 
where there are opportunities

3. CAPEX Management
• Long-range planning for Capital Expenditures for the Company based on projected growth
• Yearly Business Plan review and alignment of Capital expenditures with finance director 
and rest of leadership team in line with growth projections and current capacity
• Review and alignment of capex projects for final approval/authorization to spend
FP&A Director
• Review of post mortem analysis done for CAPEX projects. Highlight the results of post 
mortem study to Management

2) Skills Requirements:
Communication complexities: 
• Effectively communicate with functional leads and other business leaders in the country 
and provide clear guidance and support on FP&A related matters.
• Complex financial concepts to internal and external audiences must be articulated to non-financial business leaders in concise and understandable terms to influence and drive 
alignment and appropriate actions Data is used for decision-making, as well as internal and external reporting and communications. This also includes the preparation, interpretation, and alignment of financial data included in the business plans.
• Communication with non-management / associates, including Controller’s Group, 
Corporate Tax, Corporate Governance and Compliance and others. Must represent bottling 
operations’ issues and results in terms understood by others, often requiring the explanation of the underlying business drivers which are new to the recipient. 
• Credible leader when resolving issues related to financial standards and processes; must 
apply business knowledge and communicate this effectively. 

Analysis:
• Operates across multiple geographies and business environments and this role requires 
deep knowledge and expertise of bottling operations. 
• The role requires the ability to work on strategic issues and new approaches need to be 
developed continuously to ensure correct business decisions are made.
• Participate in development and prioritization of business strategies and plans with cross 
functional teams

Decision
• Define the financial planning process to ensure that inputs from different organizations are taken into account prior to the review, alignment and eventual submission to BIG as necessary 
• Helping define long-term and short-term financial goals for the Company
• Helping define savings goals for the Company to help meet profitability commitments
requirements:
• University/Bachelor’s Degree – Required
• Master’s degree - Preferred
• CA / CPA / MBA preferred
• At least 10 years financial planning and analysis relevant experience with a multi-national Company
• At least 5 years’ experience in managing people and organizations 
• Successful working experience in Financial Planning & Analysis

title: Sr Cybersecurity Network Ops Analyst
job_description:
- Leverage aggregated cyber threat intelligence, log, network flow, and anomaly data for analysis, research, and the identification of potential compromise within infrastructure or applications.
- Identify IT security gaps and provide technical and procedural recommendations that will reduce exposure to cyber-risks.
- Research and recommend new methods and applicable technologies to mitigate risk and protect information assets.
- Research new threats, attacks, and vulnerabilities that may affect IT infrastructure, and ways to identify and protect against them.
- Investigate potential cyber-attacks and intrusion attempts.
- Create detailed security incident reports, including root cause analysis and actions to mitigate such risks in the future.
- Support follow-on actions, such as coordinating with other organization teams to facilitate remediation of the alert/event/incident and close out the investigation.
- Support compliance remediation efforts, impact analysis and documentation.
- Maintain SOX ITGCs ensuring controls are designed and operating effectively.
- Provide risk consultation to requests for contractors, evaluations, and questionnaires.
- Promote security education awareness training to all employees.
- Maintain information security policies, procedures, standards.
- Provide support for day-to-day operational tasks associated with management of an enterprise network environment, including securing, and operating all facets of LAN, WAN, and WLAN services.
- Manage projects to include solution design, development of plans, project schedules, and communication of status updates on project milestones.
- Installing, configuring, and supporting network equipment including routers, switches, firewalls, and access points.
- Investigate solutions to provide continual system improvements and optimization.
- Troubleshoot, diagnose, analyze, and resolve hardware, software, and other network and performance issues.
- Provide support to remote sites, working with site personnel to identify and resolve network related issues.
- Provide on-site support for site changes when additional resources are required.
- Occasional project-based travel and flexibility to work outside of local business hours.
requirements:
Requirements: 
- Must be a team player with desire to learn.
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT Security, or equivalent experience required.
- 3+ years’ experience supporting information security analysis and multi-site IP-based network environment participating in design, implementation, maintaining and troubleshooting aspects of the network.
- Strong knowledge of cybersecurity frameworks such as ISO 27001, NIST CSF, CIS, SOX ITGC.
- Strong knowledge of:
- Windows and Linux operating system
- TCP/IP and related Internet and network protocol
- Network architecture and associated devices (routers, switches, WAPs, etc.)
- Next-generation Firewalls, UTM, IPS, IDS, DLP, HIPS, VPN, TLS/SSL, and RAS
- PCAP analysis for troubleshooting and traffic identification
- Working knowledge of SIEM and log management tools.
- Able to work effectively with peers in a team environment, while also working in a self-directed manner on multiple tasks and projects.
- Must be organized, process-minded, and deadline and detail-oriented.
- Demonstrate sound troubleshooting methodologies and strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Must possess good written and verbal communication skills needed to present to all levels of the organization.
- Ability to work with all levels of staff within and outside of IT and outside the organization.
- Ability to think through problems and visualize solutions.

Interpersonal Skills:
- Must be a team player with desire to learn and grow.
- Ability to communicate with others in a team friendly environment.
- Must display ability to work with a team harmoniously.
- Looking for a long-term team player to join our team.
 
Desired: 
- Industry security certifications such as CISSP, CISM, GCIH, GCIA, GPEN.
- Industry network certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, Security+.
- Scripting language experience (i.e., python, expect, etc., for network automation and API integration). 
- Ansible experience is a plus.
- Understanding WAN architectures, including Ethernet, site-to-site VPN and packet switching technologies such as MPLS. Use troubleshooting skills to isolate WAN related problems and work with service providers on resolution.
- Experience with wireless LAN hardware, configuration, security, and support aspects within an enterprise environment.
- SD-WAN and SDN experience.

title: Chuyên Viên Tuyển Dụng
job_description:
1. Tiếp nhận các nhu cầu tuyển dụng của cấp trên, lập các kế hoạch tuyển dụng:
- Tiếp nhận yêu cầu tuyển dụng của công ty và các bộ phận theo định biên nhân sự hoặc phát sinh theo thực tế.
- Phân tích, đánh giá nhu cầu tuyển dụng của công ty
- Phân tích công việc, viết chân dung ứng viên cần tìm kiếm
- Lập kế hoạch tuyển dụng: chiến lược, thời gian, ngân sách tuyển dụng
2. Viết MTCV, thông báo tuyển dụng và truyền thông thương hiệu tuyển dụng:
- Viết bảng mô tả công việc vị trí tuyển dụng
- Thiết kế, sáng tạo nội dung, hình ảnh truyền thông tuyển dụng trên đa kênh
- Tiến hành tìm kiếm ứng viên tiềm năng bên cạnh việc đăng tuyển để gia tăng nguồn ứng viên đầu vào
- Quản lý các đối tác tuyển dụng để truyền thông về thương hiệu cũng như công việc cần tuyển
- Tổ chức các sự kiện, hoạt động online và offline thu hút ứng viên và người lao động
- Tham gia vào các hoạt động tìm kiếm tài năng bên ngoài, tham gia các sự kiện và hội thảo liên quan để giới thiệu công ty và thu hút tài năng.
3. Tiếp nhận và sàng lọc hồ sơ ứng viên:
- Sàng lọc thông tin ứng tuyển, tiến hành phỏng vấn qua điện thoại để đánh giá trình độ và sự phù hợp về công việc, về văn hoá của ứng viên.
- Nhập và xây dựng cơ sở dữ liệu ứng viên (talent pool) lên hệ thống của công ty
- Xây dựng cộng đồng và duy trì mối quan hệ với các ứng viên trên các kênh LinkedIn, Fanpage và các kênh social
4. Sắp xếp, lên lịch, thông báo phỏng vấn:
- Liên hệ trực tiếp với ứng viên, giới thiệu và mời ứng viên tham gia phỏng vấn
- Thông báo và xác nhận lịch phỏng vấn với các bên: ứng viên và người phỏng vấn trực tiếp 
5. Tiến hành phỏng vấn và đàm phán lương:
- Trao đổi, phỏng vấn ứng viên về năng lực, kinh nghiệm công việc và các yêu cầu khác liên quan
- Đánh giá, xác định năng lực và mức độ phù hợp của ứng viên với yêu cầu công việc 
- Trao đổi, đàm phán, thuyết phục ứng viên về thỏa thuận nhận việc 
6. Làm thủ tục nhận việc:
- Trao đổi với ứng viên về các thủ tục cần chuẩn bị khi nhận việc
- Theo dõi, duy trì tương tác với ứng viên đã đồng ý nhận việc
- Làm việc với các bên chuẩn bị công cụ dụng cụ, điều kiện làm việc cho ứng viên
7. Đào tạo hội nhập:
- Giới thiệu trao đổi với nhân viên mới về công ty và các công việc
- Đưa nhân viên mới về bộ phận và bàn giao CCDC điều kiện làm việc
- Phối hợp với Trưởng Bộ phận các Phòng Ban theo dõi quá trình thử việc của nhân viên mới
- Tiến hành đánh giá kết quả thử việc của nhân viên mới
- Tiến hành các thủ tục tiếp nhận hoặc từ chối nhân viên mới sau thử việc theo quy trình tuyển dụng

Một số công việc khác dưới sự chỉ đạo của Trưởng Phòng Hành chính – Nhân sự và Ban Giám đốc.

job_description:

1.1 Tham mưu cho Ban Tổng Giám đốc về các chủ trương, chiến lược và kế hoạch phát triển nhóm nghiệp vụ bảo hiểm bao gồm: sản phẩm con người và các nghiệp vụ hỗn hợp theo phân công của Ban Tổng Giám đốc và của Công ty theo từng thời kỳ. 
1.2 Xây dựng và hoàn thiện các văn bản hướng dẫn, triển khai thực hiện các quy định của Công ty liên quan đến quản lý nghiệp vụ. 
1.3 Đề xuất các biện pháp quản lý để hoạt động kinh doanh an toàn, hiệu quả và tuân thủ quy định. 
1.4 Tham mưu cho Ban Tổng Giám đốc trong công tác phân cấp, ủy quyền của Tổng Công ty. 
2. Kiểm tra, giám sát hoạt động bảo hiểm của tất cả các nghiệp vụ thuộc mảng con người và các sản phẩm nghiệp vụ hỗn hợp khác (khi có yêu cầu). 
3. Xây dựng, cải tiến các chính sách sản phẩm của tất cả các nghiệp vụ thuộc mảng nghiệp vụ con người. 
4. Hỗ trợ và triển khai các sản phẩm nghiệp vụ tới các Đơn vị thành viên.
5. Quản lý, thực hiện báo cáo sản phẩm bảo hiểm, đăng ký sản phẩm bảo hiểm theo quy định của Pháp luật. 
6. Quản lý nội bộ và điều hành hoạt động của Ban 
6.1 Chủ động quản lý, điều hành công tác nội bộ của Ban. Duy trì ổn định và phát triển chất lượng nguồn nhân lực của Ban đảm bảo hoạt động hiệu quả và hoàn thành công việc được giao. 
6.2 Cung cấp số liệu, báo cáo theo quy định và theo yêu cầu của Tổng Công ty, cơ quan có thẩm quyền và pháp luật. 
6.3 Quản lý và sử dụng đúng mục đích các tài sản và trang thiết bị được Tổng Công ty giao. 
6.4 Tuân thủ nguyên tắc bảo mật thông tin về tình hình hoạt động kinh doanh của Tổng Công ty. 
6.5 Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo yêu cầu của Ban Tổng Giám đốc.

job_description:
- Làm việc với các bản vẽ từ xin phép đến thực tế thi công bằng các chương trình đồ họa thông dụng.

Số lương tuyển : 05

 Deploy architectural drawings and follow the basic concept & design from Korea. Completely developed drawing, no design.

Ability to execute drawings of whole design process from Basic Design to Construction Drawing within project timeframe follow to Company’s Manual
- Luôn kiểm tra chất lượng bản vẽ để đảm bảo đúng với quy chuẩn của Cty 
Check the quality of drawings to ensure compliance with the requirements of the company
- Tham gia cuộc họp như một phần của điều phối thiết kế và để đảm bảo thời hạn và các mốc quan trọng.
Participate in meeting as part of design coordination and to ensure deadlines and milestones are respected.
- Bắt buộc phải làm việc theo quy chuẩn của CTy, luôn đoàn kết với team member
Must work according to company standards, always in solidarity with team members

Other tasks if required
Company website http://anudg.com/
requirements:
Chuyên Môn Của Bạn
- Nam / Nữ có kinh nghiệm triển khai kiến trúc từ 2 năm trở lên.
Male / Female with experience in architect drawings from 2 years above

Expert in Xref

- Trung thực, chăm chỉ, cẩn thận và có trách nhiệm, hợp tác làm việc theo nhóm tốt
Honest, Hard-working, careful and responsible, teamwork.

title: Customer Market Insight Specialist
job_description:
The Customer Market Insight Specialist is responsible for gathering, analyzing, and interpreting customer and market data to provide actionable insights that support strategic decision-making across the organization. This role plays a crucial part in understanding consumer behavior, identifying market trends, and helping Guardian Vietnam to tailor its products, services, and marketing strategies to meet customer needs effectively.

Key Responsibilities:

• Market Research: Conduct primary and secondary market research to gather data on consumer behavior, preferences, trends, and competitive landscape.
• Data Analysis: Leveraging data from multiple sources to create impactful analytics and selling stories to identify risks, opportunities, patterns, insights for business growth., and performance gaps in assortment, distribution, shelving, promotional and pricing strategies and tactics.
• Reporting: Prepare detailed reports and dashboards, presentations that summarize research findings, insights, and recommendations. Ensure timely and quality analytics deliverables to satisfy business needs effectively under the dynamic business environment

title: Service-Learning and CAS Secretary
job_description:
Division: Middle/High School
Position: Service-Learning & CAS Secretary
Reports to: Service-Learning & CAS Coordinator
Working Hours: Monday-Friday, 8:00am-5:00pm

HOW TO APPLY: 
Interested candidates please send your application via the School recruitment portal at: https://www.applitrack.com/unishanoi/onlineapp/_application.aspx?posJobCodes=490&posFirstChoice=2020%20-%202021%20SCHOOL%20YEAR%20OPENINGS&posSpecialty=

DEADLINE: Tuesday April 23, 2024

Summary of the Position:

The UNIS Hanoi Service-Learning & CAS secretary is responsible for administrative assistance, logistical management, and secretarial support of the Service-Learning and CAS program. The Service-Learning Programme at UNIS Hanoi is central to our Mission and Guiding Principles and is firmly embedded in both Curricular (MYP & DP) and Co-Curricular learning. Students engage in a structured process of: investigation, planning, action, reflection and celebration. This takes place during subject classes, interdisciplinary units, grade-level trips, meetings, and Service-Learning lessons within the school day; as well at other times including after-school, weekends, and overnight events, visits, and trips. In Grades 11 and 12, Service-Learning forms part of their IBDP CAS (Creativity, Activity & Service) programme and is part of all students' high school experience. UNIS Service-Learning & CAS collaborates with over 30 partners within our wider community including non-profits, social enterprises, governmental agencies, experts, local schools, NGOs, and orphanages. Students/Student Groups engage with service-learning partners in connection to service, action, and global citizenship. 

Responsibilities: 

• Logistics management
o Prepare supplies/materials and make procurement orders for service-learning events, classes, and trips
o Schedule all Service-Learning/CAS events on school calendars
o Coordinate equipment, facilities, tech/operations requests, and referees for the successful running of events
o Make all event-related food/beverage arrangements
o Support the Service-Learning team in monitoring budgetary concerns
o Create and manage chat space/email lists and groups relevant to the service-learning programme
o Liaise with the Operations Department to arrange event set-up/take-down for all events
o Work with the Advancement Office to provide photos, articles and other correspondence
• Trips & Events:
o Register students and send communication to students and families
o Manage all transportation associated with trips through communication with Transportation Coordinator 
o Communicate with teachers, students and parents/guardians regarding all trip information (field trip forms, email updates, etc.)
o Work with teams to evaluate trips on an annual basis
o Manage field trip forms, passports, and visa from students; Follow up with teachers, students, parents/guardians on incomplete forms
• LMS & SIS (Veracross/ Toddle) 
o Liaise with Grade Level Teams to organise progress checks for CAS requirements and ensure students meet the graduation requirements.
o Monitor the CAS progress of students through Veracross/Toddle
o Provide Veracross/Toddle assistance to students and teachers
o Prepare class and event rosters on Veracross
• Record keeping 
o Maintain records to help students to identify personal and ATL goals for CAS and Service-Learning
o Monitor the range and balance of CAS engagements undertaken by individual students
o Read and respond to CAS diaries/journals
• General Management 
o Provide administrative assistance, logistical management, and secretarial support of the Service-Learning and CAS programme
o Maintain the UNIS communication hubs and website information associated with the activities of Service-Learning Office and the CAS programme
o Assist with the development of the Service-Learning Handbook
o Assist with the distribution, collection, maintenance, ordering and inventory of all equipment and materials for Service-Learning/CAS activities.
• Other responsibilities as delegated by Supervisor
requirements:
Key Competencies:

i. Education 
• Undergraduate degree in English, Communications or Social Work
ii. Experience 
• 3+ years’ experience in a similar role, preferably in large organisation 
iii. Technical knowledge
• Above-average proficiency in written and spoken English
• Customer service orientation
• Knowledge of community services
• Organization and time management skills
• General knowledge of economic, legal and political issues
• Proficiency in MS Office and database management programs, knowledge of web tools

● Phát triển chiến lược phát triển kinh doanh chi tiết và hiệu quả, để đạt được mục tiêu doanh số và tăng trưởng kinh doanh.

title: Product Support Officer
job_description:
I. Job Summary:
Product Support Officer is responsible for the product execution throughout the Product Development Division. His/her accountabilities are maintaining the product system setup from Product side, working closely with other relevant teams (Risk, Sales, Underwriting, Operations, DT&M, ICT...) to define the workflow, operation process to ensure the process run smoothly and support sales & Product Division to achieve the company target/ strategy.

II. Key Roles & Responsibilities
The Product Support Officer performs a wide range of duties including but not limited to:
1. Manage and maintain the Sales Finance portal to support sales activity of Sales Finance product include (30%)
• Set up and manage dealer
• Control product list & price
• Set up and de-active promotion campaign with dealer
2. Support for the sales division to ensure the process, operation, and system (30%)
• Support sales and partnership activity on daily basis to maintain smoothly operation regarding to system support development 
• Receive and support Sales special request regarding to process, operation, deviation request
• Provide instruction/ guideline to users of new product/ process/ promotion campaign
• Maintain the Product policy/ manual and process
3. Updating and testing the system for new product development (30%)
• Raise requirements to develop/ change or modify system to adapt with new product development 
• Conduct the UAT test with end users to launch new product/ dealer/ promotion campaign if any
4. Other tasks (10%)

• How to research and keep up to date with market’s changing and technology that may impact product development
• System: loan management
• Execute and monitor business performance 
• Maintain operation of Sales Finance product, manage dealer, control product list & price
• Referable experience in a product team/ credit operation
4. Skills 
• English - Upper-intermediate

• Collaboration, Problem analysis, Presentation skills
• Ability to define problem, collect data, establish facts and draw valid conclusions

job_description:
In charge of Product Planning, Pricing, Network Management & Expansion: 

1. PRODUCT PLANNING:
- Oversee the entire product life cycle by reviewing product specifications and requirements, appraising new product ideas and/or product or packaging changes.
- Ensure the sufficient product planning by optimizing OPSI (order, purchase, sales, inventory), policy, budget control.
- Assess market competition by analyzing market research & customer feedback
- Develop product sales & promotion (ATL, BTL) strategies in coordination with sales & related teams to obtain product market share 

2. PRICING:
- Determine product pricing by utilizing market research data; reviewing production and sales costs; anticipating volume; costing special and customized orders
- Manage Gross Profit, Net Profit by model-wise, channel-wise to ensure the delivery of company target

3. NETWORK MANAGEMENT & EXPANSION:
- Manage channel wise, account wise discount structure to balance channel and maximize Gross Profit, Net Profit.
- Plan and execute channel expansion strategies: Model-wise, Account-wise, Area-wise to increase channel coverage effectively.

4. OTHERS:
- Coordinate with Head Quarter to customize & execute the strategies 
- Lead Product Team to achieve the business target by developing skills & setting objectives, targets & guidelines for direct reports

1. Education background:
- Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration/Economics or related major.
2. Working experience:
- At least 5 years of working experience in Product Management 
- Having experience in Home Appliance/ Consumer Electronics product is preferred.
3. Skills:
- Proficiency in English and/or Chinese.
- Excellent in Microsoft Office and data analysis skills.
- Strong communication and presentation skills .
- Advanced negotiation and industry benchmark knowledge.
- Profound understanding of sales policies and processes.
4. Others:
- Result-oriented
- Having business mindset
- Ability to work under high pressure

job_description:

- Tư vấn và chăm sóc khách hàng (tiềm năng và khách hàng hiện có) do công ty giao.
- Khảo sát, mở rộng thị trường và đại lý mới.
- Thu thập, phân tích và tổng hợp thông tin về khách hàng, thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh tại khu vực mình phụ trách.

- Lập và triển khai kế họach phát triển khách hàng, thị trường, doanh thu theo tuần, tháng, quý.

requirements:

- Sức khỏe tốt, có thể đi công tác xa.

title: Giám Đốc Marketing
job_description:
1. Tham mưu cho Ban Lãnh đạo về truyền thông, nhận diện và phát triển thương hiệu


- Tham mưu cho Ban Lãnh đạo về chiến lược phát triển thị trường, phát triển thương hiệu của Tập đoàn.
- Tham mưu cho Ban Lãnh đạo về các chiến dịch truyền thông và quảng bá thương hiệu nhằm khuyếch trương hình ảnh Tập đoàn.
- Tham mưu, đề xuất cho Ban Lãnh đạo các biện pháp nhằm tăng hiệu quả công việc, tiết giảm chi phí không cần thiết trong hoạt động của Ban.

2. Hoạch định và phát triển chiến lược Marketing ngắn hạn và dài hạn của Tập đoàn và các thương hiệu phù hợp với chiến lược kinh doanh chung của Tập đoàn
- Lập kế hoạch marketing tổng thể hàng năm của Tập đoàn và ngân sách thực hiện theo định hướng, chiến lược, chủ đề tháng/quý/năm được Ban Lãnh đạo thông qua. Triển khai kế hoạch và ngân sách hiệu quả.
- Tham gia xây dựng các kế hoạch marketing cụ thể cho các Phòng/Ban/ Đơn vị.
- Nghiên cứu các hình thức truyền thông, tiếp thị và chăm sóc khách hàng trên hệ thống kênh internet của Công ty và các đối thủ cạnh tranh khác để xây dựng những phương án truyền thông thương hiệu đạt hiệu quả tối ưu về mức độ bao phủ, mức độ nhận biết, sự yêu thích và hài lòng của khách hàng.

3. Tổ chức thực hiện các hoạt động và chương trình nghiên cứu thị trường
- Giám sát thực hiện kế hoạch marketing của các Phòng/Ban/Đơn vị, đảm bảo sự phối hợp nhịp nhàng giữa các Phòng/Ban/Đơn vị chức năng.
- Phối hợp với Trưởng các Phòng/Ban/Đơn vị khác để cùng thống nhất chiến lược phù hợp cho hoạt động kinh doanh nói chung và marketing nói riêng.
- Xác định các yêu cầu của khách hàng và đáp ứng các yêu cầu này; Đồng thời đảm bảo toàn bộ đội ngũ chuyên viên marketing nhận thức các yêu cầu mới của khách hàng về sản phẩm, dịch vụ của Tập đoàn.
- Xây dựng và tổ chức các sự kiện thu hút sự chú ý của khách hàng, đối tác và cộng đồng.

4. Thiết lập và duy trì quan hệ với các đối tác, cơ quan truyền thông, các nhà cung cấp dịch vụ có liên quan phục vụ cho hoạt động marketing của Tập đoàn
- Xây dựng mạng lưới đối tác.
- Thường xuyên xây dựng và củng cố mối quan hệ với báo chí, truyền thông, các đối tác có liên quan tạo hình ảnh tốt đẹp của Công ty trước công chúng để đảm bảo hình ảnh Công ty được thể hiện một cách tốt nhất ra công chúng.

5. Quản lý và điều hành hoạt động phòng Tiếp thị
- Trực tiếp chỉ đạo, quản lý, điều hành và theo dõi tiến độ thực hiện công việc của nhân viên trong phòng Tiếp thị.
- Chịu trách nhiệm về các chỉ tiêu và hiệu quả hoạt động của phòng Tiếp thị.
- Tìm kiếm và phát triển đội ngũ chuyên viên tiếp thị.
- Phối hợp tuyển dụng; đào tạo về chuyên môn, nghiệp vụ, kỹ năng; đánh giá kết quả công việc CBNV của Phòng.
requirements:
- Độ tuổi: 30 - 55 tuổi.
- Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên Chuyên ngành: Marketing, Quản trị kinh doanh, Kinh tế, hoặc các chuyên ngành khác có liên quan.
- Kinh nghiệm: Có ít nhất 7 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc tại lĩnh vực Marketing, PR trong đó có ít nhất 03 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương trong lĩnh vực bất động sản, bán lẻ, giáo dục, khách sạn. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc cho các công ty nước ngoài.
- Ngoại ngữ: Sử dụng thành thạo tiếng Anh (nghe, nói, đọc, viết).
- Tin học: Sử dụng thành thạo máy vi tính, các phần mềm văn phòng, chuyên ngành…
- Kỹ năng:
+ Kỹ năng lắng nghe.
+ Khả năng giao tiếp, thuyết trình, thuyết phục tốt.
+ Kỹ năng đàm phán, giải quyết xung đột, ngoại giao và ứng xử tốt.
 + Có năng lực và uy tín về tổ chức, lãnh đạo và điều hành. 
 + Khả năng viết bài và biên tập thông tin. 
 + Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập, sáng tạo, giải quyết vấn đề và ra quyết định. 
- Kiến thức liên quan:
+ Có kiến thức sâu rộng và năng lực thực tiễn về quản trị và điều hành doanh nghiệp và các lĩnh vực nghiệp vụ phụ trách. 
+ Am hiểu hệ thống luật kinh tế hiện hành và có kiến thức pháp lý tổng quát. 
+ Hiểu biết về Pháp luật liên quan lĩnh vực phụ trách. 
- Các tố chất cần thiết khác: Năng động, tác phong chuyên nghiệp, chịu được áp lực công việc cao.

** Chế độ phúc lợi:
- Thưởng nhân các ngày Lễ/Tết theo quy định của Nhà nước
- Thưởng thành tích định kỳ và đột xuất cho cá nhân hoặc tập thể;
- Thưởng sáng kiến cải tiến kỹ thuật, nâng cao hiệu quả hoạt động kinh doanh;
- Thưởng lương tháng 13 và thưởng thành tích theo KPIs lên đến 03 tháng lương;
- Thưởng thâm niên: 01 tháng lương (Thưởng trên mỗi lần đủ 5 năm thâm niên, các mốc 5, 10, 15, 20,…).
- Chính sách ưu đãi mua căn hộ với chiết khấu và quà tặng đặc biệt cho CBNV có thành tích tốt;
- Tặng quà nhân các sự kiện đặc biệt của CBNV: Sinh nhật, quà cho CBNV nữ nhân ngày 8/3, 20/10;
- Các khoản trợ cấp: Kết hôn, tang chế, ốm đau, thai sản, xăng, công tác, giao tế, đồng phục;
- Các chương trình teambuilding, chương trình đào tạo theo chính sách của Công ty.
- Các chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN, khám sức khỏe tổng quát theo quy định; 
- Làm việc tại toà nhà văn phòng cao cấp, hiện đại.
- Đi du lịch hàng năm, nghỉ phép năm (12 ngày) và được cộng thêm lên đến 03 ngày phép cho cấp quản lý.
- Nhiều hoạt động văn hóa, thể thao, xã hội dành cho CBNV;
- Các chương trình chăm lo cho con em CBNV: tặng quà nhân dịp quốc tế thiếu nhi, trung thu, khen thưởng con CBNV có thành tích học tập tốt
