title: Business Development Manager
job_description:
Key Purpose of the Job:

The key responsibilities for the role are as follow: 
● Build and developing Corporate and Institutional strategic accounts 
● Develop Key Account Management capability for WSE 
● Build retail channel through Corporate Partnerships 
● Drive awareness of WSE Corporate Partnerships offerings with the support of the marketing and Event Management team 

Key Areas of Responsibility:

1. Build and developing Corporate and Institutional strategic accounts 
o Proactively engage with corporate and institutional key stakeholders to identify organizations with need for higher English proficiency 
o Build corporate network through attending conferences, networking events, workshops, industry exhibitions. …
o Clearly identify the organizations needs in terms of English proficiency and develop a granular understanding of the decision-making structure of the client organization 
o Leverage WSE Organizational English Proficiency Assessment asset to set-up a structured approach from the need assessment phase down to the monitoring of the execution of the program 
o Relentlessly help the client stakeholders to accelerate the decision-making process of their organization while clearly understand their end-to-end decision-making procedures until deal closure and payment 
o Monitor the execution of the project and prepare to report for WSE management and clients religiously 
o Maintenance of an accurate pipeline and monthly forecast across existing accounts 
o Collaborate with Retail sales and other stakeholders like Marketing and TMK to identify and develop potential Corporate Solutions accounts. 

2. Collaborate with Key Account Management capability.
o Staff the Key Account Management function to ensure the adequate support for the stellar delivery execution of the strategic accounts 
o Ensure key account management staff comply with our standardized delivery method to achieve stellar execution of the strategic accounts 
o Drive recurring revenues from strategic accounts through productive and professional relationships with key client stakeholders as well as stellar delivery of the service provided 

3. Build retail channel through Corporate Partnerships 
o Identify and build a network of Corporate Partners to develop a robust retail acquisition channel of student’s
o Provide input in and deploy exclusive promotions offered to Corporate partner’s employees (and sometimes customers) that will stimulate the Corporate Partnerships channel 
o Develop cross-promotional opportunities that will stimulate the Corporate Partnership channel 
o Manage contracts and agreements with the corporate partners 

4. Drive awareness of WSE Corporate Sales & Partnerships offerings with the support of the Marketing and Direct Marketing
o Support management of the marcomms and events in collaboration with the Event Management team and Sales team to stimulate the Corporate Partnership channel 
o Provide input and execute on the marketing strategy to grow the strategic accounts 
o Support monitoring the performance of the marketing initiatives aimed at growing the Corporate Partnerships retail channel as well as the strategic accounts 

While the above includes a description of the essential functions of the position, other duties may be assigned. This job description is subject to change at the discretion of management.

Major challenge:

Know-how and Competency requirements

• Bachelor’s degree
• Major Subject: Business Administration, Sale or Marketing are preferred
• External Communication Required: Yes

• Others (please specify)
requirements:
- Education: Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Economics, Sales & Marketing preferred 
- Languages: Vietnamese and English (minimum Wall Street English Level 9) 
- Previous Experience: 
 • Minimum 5 years experience in education industry 
 • Minimum 3 years in sales management (Coding teaching required). Premium sales and service experience is a plus (Education, Real Estate, Insurance, Finance and banking, Education, Luxury retail, Headhunting, Premium Health and fitness) 

Required Competencies 
• Leadership and integrity 
• Able to present ideas convincingly with a high level of energy and positivity, strong closing skills 
• Solution-driven mindset and strong negotiation skills 
• Active listener, willingness to learn and challenge themselves 
• Understanding of core sales principles: sales pipeline, forecasts, planning, and techniques 
• Experienced in leading and motivating a high-performing sales team to exceed targets and drive revenue growth consistently

• Customer service-oriented mindset 
• Professional appearance, confident attitude, and great interpersonal skills

title: Senior Digital Marketing Specialist
job_description:
We are looking for a Senior Digital Marketing Specialist to assist in the planning, execution and optimization of our online marketing efforts. The promotion of products and services through digital channels is a complex procedure with great potential which becomes increasingly useful for companies such as ours. 
The ideal candidate will have a passion for all things in marketing and technology. You will be well-versed in the concepts surrounding digital marketing and how the Internet can become a strong asset to securing growing revenue as well as intuitive with great ideas to reinforce our marketing campaign. 

Your responsibilities include:
- Execute optimized online advertising campaigns via Google Ads (Advanced), Tiktok Ads, Facebook Ads etc., to generate leads and acquire customers.
- Manage in-app marketing initiatives, including launching app-performance advertising campaigns: GG Universal, Apple Search Ads,...
- Plan and monitor the company's ongoing presence on social media platforms such as Facebook, Tiktok and others.
- Propose creative concepts and collaborate with the content team to bolster engagement on the company's fan pages.
- Work in tandem with designers to enhance user experience (UX) and improve conversion rates.
- Analyze the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts using an assortment of web analytics tools, including Google Analytics and WebTrends.
- Gain insights into the latest online marketing trends and continually update marketing strategies to remain current.
- Sustain partnerships with media agencies and vendors to support marketing objectives.
requirements:
- BSc/BA in Marketing or relevant field. At least 5 years as an expert in Google Ads, App Performance Ads for lead generation, highly experienced in performance tracking.
- Experience in the fintech or financial services industry is an advantage.
- Being good at handling a heavy digital marketing budget to maximize lead generation performance is a big plus.
- Excellent understanding of digital marketing concepts and best practices.
- Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas)
- Perfect knowledge of web analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics, Tag Manager, WebTrends, etc.)
- Skills and experience in creative content writing
- Analytical mindset and critical thinking
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
